Interface Tool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EraserTool, PaintBrushTool, PencilTool, RectangleTool

    public interface Tool
    This interface represents a Tool object. Tools have some action when they are pressed, dragged, and also released.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      The name of this tool.
      void onDrag(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
      Tool method that is called when the mouse is dragged.
      void onPress(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
      Tool method that is called when the mouse is pressed.
      void onRelease(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
      Tool method that is called when the mouse is released.

    • Method Detail

      • onPress

        void onPress(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e,
             javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
        Tool method that is called when the mouse is pressed. Usually involves beginning drawing something.
        Parameters:
        e - The mouseevent that fired this onPress.
        g - The current graphics context.

      • onDrag

        void onDrag(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e,
            javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
        Tool method that is called when the mouse is dragged. Usually involves updating the drawing location.
        Parameters:
        e - The mouseevent that fired this onDrag.
        g - The current graphics context.

      • onRelease

        void onRelease(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e,
               javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
        Tool method that is called when the mouse is released. Usually involves completing an individual stroke/shape.
        Parameters:
        e - The mouseevent that fired this onRelease.
        g - The current graphics context.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        The name of this tool.
        Returns:
        This tool's name.
